title: Grace: A Historical Western Romance
description: An entertaining high adventure western romance story!Grace is the youngest of the Bernstein sisters, and a true cowgirl, independent and wily. No man will get to this girl easily! But then she is caught up in a dramatic town robbery, and ends being kidnapped by the robber gang and their leader, Dalton. Who is this enigmatic man? Why does Grace feel both repulsed and attracted to him? As she gradually learns about Dalton's recent past, she realises he's not the man he's pretending to be, a discovery that ultimately leads her to making difficult decisions about her own life.Download this high adventure romance drama short story now! Includes an additional series of romantic short stories selected for your pleasure from the publisher's premium library.
author: Amy Field
